content: --सूयः --यं a great sacrifice performed by a universal monarch (in which the tributary princes also took part) at the time of his coronation as a mark of his undisputed sovereignty; राजा वै राजसूयेनेष्ट्वां भवति <ls>Śat. Br.</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> सम्राद् also. {2} a lotus. {3} a mountain.

--सूयः --यं a great sacrifice performed by a universal monarch (in which the tributary princes also took part) at the time of his coronation as a mark of his undisputed sovereignty; राजा वै राजसूयेनेष्ट्वां भवति <ls>Śat. Br.</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> सम्राद् also. {2} a lotus. {3} a mountain.
